sentences.en: Exciting mini - games challenge you to unlock the secret power of the portals.
sentences.cn: 刺激的 迷你 游戏将挑战你发现这座神秘之门后的神秘能量.

sentences.en: Federal law allows consumers to unlock their own phones.
sentences.cn: 联邦法律允许解锁自己的手机!

sentences.en: He had the cunning to unlock and re - lock the door, without shutting it.
sentences.cn: 他很机灵地把门锁开开又重新上了锁, 可没把它关严.

sentences.en: I'll unlock the chain, and you pull it through, okay?
sentences.cn: 我解开链子你把车开进去好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I've lost my key and can't unlock the front door.
sentences.cn: 我把钥匙丢了,没法开开前门的锁了.

sentences.en: Now the rub: Understanding where the keys are won't unlock the door.
sentences.cn: 现在擦: 了解那里把钥匙是不会解锁的大门.

sentences.en: She planned to unlock the store at 8.00 sharp this morning.
sentences.cn: 她打算今天早上8点整准时开门营业。

sentences.en: Since then, several efforts to unlock credit have failed.
sentences.cn: 从那时以来, 开启贷款的几个努力失败了.

sentences.en: The process unlock will take a little with this software.
sentences.cn: 过程解锁,将需要一点这个软件.

sentences.en: There are great concepts which can unlock that, express it.
sentences.cn: 自有一些伟大的思想能够发之于湮没之中, 示之于普天下.

sentences.en: Unlock File Source Code source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 解锁文件源代码的源代码的完整性, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: We have an opportunity now to really unlock the secrets of the universe.
sentences.cn: 我们现在有机会去真正解开宇宙的奥秘。

sentences.en: We heard somebody unlock the door.
sentences.cn: 我们听见外面有人开门锁.

sentences.en: We intend to unlock the market in Zhujiang Delta region.
sentences.cn: 我们打算在珠三角开拓市场.

sentences.en: WITH THE DRB, ACTUATE DOOR UNLOCK AND OBSERVE THE TEST LIGHT.
sentences.cn: 用DRB触发门开锁继电器并观察测试灯.

trans.tran_en: to unfasten the lock on a door, box etc
